description: This file defines a Qwik component for the recipes route, handling recipe search, tag filtering, and displaying recipe data with loading and empty states.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main React-like component function defining the recipe explorer UI.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Initializes search query from URL parameters and sets loading state.

methods.name: toggleTag$
methods.description: Function to toggle tags in the activeTags set.

methods.name: useComputed$
methods.description: Computes filtered recipes based on current query and selected tags.
